August, 1 9U8.COPY NO.^cabinet ministerial COMMITTEE ON CIVIL DEFENCE: composition and TERMS OF REFERENCENote by the Deputy Secretary of the Cabinet1. The Prime Minister has appointed, a Committee-with thefollowing terms of reference:-"To review the action that has been taken, and consider what further action should be taken, in preparation for civil defence."2. - The Committee will be composed as follows:-Secretary of. State for the Home Department(Chairman)Minister of defence secretary of State for ScotlandMinister of HealthSecretary of State for WarMinister of.TransportMinister of WorksFinancial Secretary, Treasury.3. The Secretaries of the Committee will be BrigadierA.T. Cornwall-Jones and Mr. R.P.. Fraser (Cabinet Office).k. The Committee will report to "the Defence Committee.5. The existing Civil Defence Committee will be renamedthe "Official Committee on Civil Defence".(Signed) W.S. MURRIECabinet Office, S.W.1.28th August, 1 92+8.
